summary: Feature request to expose an enum for ExecutionStatus in workflow execution queries instead of using string literals. Users want type-safe access to execution status values like 'Running' rather than hardcoding strings.
userImpact: Developers must use string literals for execution status in queries, reducing type safety and making code more error-prone.
proposedFix: Expose an ExecutionStatus enum that can be used in workflow execution queries to replace string literals.
resolutionDetails: Maintainer determined the feature would not add sufficient value, especially given plans for a more comprehensive query builder.
keyQuote: Not sure this would actually add value. Closing.
